text: King Kong is an American giant monster adventure horror movie series. introduced in 1933 to future sequels. == Movies == * King Kong (1933) * Son of Kong (1933) * King Kong vs. Godzilla (1963) * King Kong Escapes (1968) * King Kong (1976) * King Kong Lives (1986) * The Mighty Kong (1998) * Kong: King of Atlantis (2004) * Peter Jackson's King Kong (2005) * Kong: Return to the Jungle (2006) * Jack Buchanan's King Kong (2016) * Kong: Skull Island (2017) * Godzilla vs. Kong (2021) * Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire (2024) == TV shows == * The King Kong Show (1966-1969) * Kong: The Animated Series (2001-2002) * Kong: King of the Apes (2016-2018) * Skull Island (2023-present) * King Kong (2026 Live-action series) Category:1933 establishments Category:English- language movies Category:Series of movies Category:King Kong Category:Monster movies
title: King Kong (franchise)
